subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The newly paved racetrack at Lowe's Motor Speedway, and the hard tires supplied by Goodyear in response to an embarrassing number of tire blowouts last year, could cause a lot of problems for drivers.
snippet: The newly paved racetrack at Lowe's Motor Speedway, and the hard tires supplied by Goodyear in response to an embarrassing number of tire blowouts last year, could cause a lot of problems for drivers.
